about_the_game:
Game Name: Adventure Book in Dimension

Game type: Long-term update operational RPG

TAG: Fantasy / Drama / RPG / General Orientation / Japanese Style / Drama / Gacha Development / Turn-based Combat / Dubbing / Headless girl/ Shower / Free / Novel Adaptation

Game Production Engine: RPGmakerVX ACE (RMVA)

Game window: 640*480

Parent project: Dimensional Journey

Version Info: V2.21  (only available on PC)

The latest version was released: November 8, 2024

"Adventure Book in Dimension" is a long-term operational turn-based RPG game affiliated with the project "Dimensional Journey", adapted from the novel "Wonderful Dimensional Journey" (the original author served as a copywriter and operation planner in the game).

In the game, as a new member of the "Tribal Clan", a team of human magicians, you received a magic book called "Adventure Book in Dimension" as a gift from a mysterious senior. It is said that through this magic book, you can immerse yourself in the main adventure story of the "tribal clan", and the story of the dimensional journey is unfolded in the form of an RPG. The audience of the game is average-oriented, with a cute Japanese anime style and combat dubbing, and the headless horseman mother as a characteristic setting, while incorporating "drenching culture" related stalks. The game is a long-term operation with regular updates and events, and is completely free without any paid content. Players can not only experience the story, but also participate in high-difficulty challenge gameplay. Use the keyboard throughout the game, ↑↓←→ keys to move the character/cursor, spacebar/Z key to confirm, X key to return/open the backpack, F6 to zoom in on the screen, and hold shift to sprint.

【 Main story 】

From "Adventure Book in Dimension", the player first enters the main story. In the game, players take on the role of a new member of the Tribe Family, a team of human wizards. In order to understand the adventure story of the founding of the tribal clan, you borrow a magic book called "Adventure Book in Dimension" from a mysterious elder. It is said that through this book, the adventure story of the Dimensional journey will be presented in the form of an RPG game. In this way, your journey of discovery begins, and explore the adventure that is different from the original.

The main story of the dimensional exploration book is adapted from the enemy olive's novel "Wonderful Dimensional Journey", planning 800,000 words of fiction and a huge world view and plot to provide material for the main story of the game.

In addition, the main story of the dimensional journey is currently divided into four parts, respectively:

The first Dimensional Magical World (Seasons 1-6), the Second Otherworld (seasons 7-11), the third Neverland (seasons 12-14), and the fourth Dream Feather (seasons 15-18). The latest project schedule is the 15th season "Past Life Aria", the current version of the Dimensional Exploration book (version 2.1) has been updated to the second season 8.

【 Character Acquisition 】

The first time you enter the main story, you can get the main character trio R DDW (Sage/doctor), R Potato (Break Army/Archer), R Star Pig (Sage/Caster), and other characters can be obtained by drawing cards. At the beginning of the main line card pool, there are only five permanent SSR characters: SSR Lingxin Elizabeth (brave/warrior), SSR Su Jiu (Sage/knight), SSR Di Yan (Sage/Caster), SSR Nikhe (Sage/Leader), SSR Baki Andian (Sage/Caster), and resident SR Cat God (sage/priest). As the player progresses through the main story, more and more main limited SR/SSR characters will be added to the card pool for the player to draw.

In addition, in addition to the main line card pool, the game card system also has weapon card pool, special card pool, Lord card pool, current main line UP card pool, current weapon card pool, etc.

In addition, players are free to choose their favorite card theme, each card theme has its own card background and BGM.

[Three Phases and character classes] Three phases (the brave, the broken army, the Sage) are three dimensions used to measure the character in the dimensional universe, and each phase can improve the various attributes of the magician in different proportions. The highest of the three phases of the character is called the "main phase", where red represents the brave, green represents the broken army, and blue represents the sage.

Classes are used to describe the main battle position of the character, and there are twelve classes in the game:

Warrior: A character with both survivability and output.

Caster: A character whose primary ability is to inflict magic damage.

Knight: A character whose main ability is to reduce the damage taken by teammates.

Priest: A character whose primary ability is to restore their energy/special effects.

Leader: A role whose main ability is to provide us with gains.

Archer: A character whose main ability is high unit output.

Doctor: A role in which healing is our primary competence.

Wizard: A character whose primary ability is to use items or inflict negative effects on enemies.

Summoner: A character whose primary ability is to summon summoners with combat abilities.

Priest: A character whose primary ability is to inflict special boosts on us other than damage.

Agent: A character whose primary ability is a special skill mechanic.

Medicine Man: A character whose primary ability is to use items to fight.

Through the combination of the main three phases and occupation, each role has a combination of the main three phases and occupation, for example, the main three phases of Lingyu Elizabeth is the sage and the occupation is the priest.

【 Delicate Japanese painting style 】

We have a relatively fixed team of artists. The planners and producers regularly invite artists to contribute new art resources such as character drawing, skin drawing and material ICONS to the game.

Every one of our character sketches, skin sketches, illustrations, and some of the most important game ICONS are commissioned by a designer or producer.

【 Role Dubbing 】

Starting with version 1.4, the Dimensional Exploration Book includes combat voice acting for all resident SSR characters, mainline Limited SSR characters, Special SER characters, Lord SP characters, and some Paradise Limited SSR characters (Headless girls). The voice acting of other characters is also in progress, and the follow-up will be implemented one after another.

The voice acting of the game is performed by the voice acting team of the Dimensional Journey Project, and each character voice acting has been reviewed and adjusted by the project manager and the project's two voice acting directors.

Note: If your voice condition is good, Mandarin level reached second level A and above, we also welcome you to audition, paid/unpaid dubbing we have.

【 Skin system 】

There is a skin system in the game, and character skins can be redeemed through in-game "skin fragments". After replacing the skin, the avatar will appear as a skin, and the skin sketch will be displayed when it is the character's turn to act during combat.

The skin quality is divided into four levels: "Fine", "Epic", "Supreme" and "Heavenly Artisan", among which, when wearing the skin of supreme quality and above, some characters will be replaced with the voice of the skin special version. When you wear the highest quality "Artisan" skin, you will also receive an exclusive "draw card theme" for that skin.

Note: There is a cumulative spending limit skin in the game, such skin refers to the cumulative consumption of "project points (obtained by participating in the planner's activities, no money channels, exploration book is a non-profit game) to earn the skin, not gold.

In addition, we will introduce some version limited skins based on the version content (which will be copied).

【 Paradise of Headless knight mother 】

There are also a number of unique character types: Headless girls (dullahan), and in the event world, you can also enter the gathering area of headless girls - aerial paradise, for a special aerial paradise line plot. Players can also obtain these characters in the corresponding park limited card pool.

In addition, in the version of the activity, you can also see the headless girl figure.

【 Equipment and Character Development System 】

In the Dimensional Exploration Book, you can develop the characters and equipment you gain to become stronger.

Role upgrade: As the level of the role increases, the basic attributes of the role will be greatly improved. You can use Experience balls to assign character experiences.

Weapon systems: Weapons can be purchased in stores, copies dropped, and cards drawn. The weapon is divided into three parts: base three phase panel, stat bonus and weapon skill.

Weapons advanced: The weapons of the dimensional exploration book can improve their attributes by advancing, the real quality skin can be advanced to the highest level I, and the best quality skin can be advanced to the highest level II. Weapon progression requires the consumption of the weapon's corresponding series of credentials and stone (obtained by challenging the "Sky Ladder").

Magic Marks System: Magic Marks can greatly improve the character's attributes, and each character can assemble four magic marks.

Mark upgrade: Level 123 marks can be dropped directly through the store or copy, level 4 and above need to use the level 3 mark or the corresponding mark crystal to upgrade. The material consumed by the magic Mark upgrade can be obtained by challenging the "Sky Ladder" in high difficulty.

Character traceability: After the player passes the 60th floor of the Sky ladder, the character can be traced to reach level 100 (full level), and the traceability system will increase the skill effect of the character.

Magic Card System: Version 2.0 is a new system that opens when the player passes through the 90th level of the Sky Ladder, similar to the Onmyoji soul system, which provides the character with basic attributes while collecting the magic card set to gain additional effects.

【 Version activity 】

The Dimensional Discovery Book regularly releases version events, each ending after two major versions of the actual installation. In the version activity. From the campaign story, campaign map, character interaction, campaign combat and other gameplay, the campaign tokens earned during the campaign can also be used to redeem items in the campaign store that can significantly increase the strength of the character. In addition, the limited skin, activity card pool and so on are opened with the version activity.

【 Sky Ladder 】

The Sky Ladder is a difficult challenge of the Dimensional exploration book, and every major version will update 15 layers, with a BOSS for every 5 layers. By challenging the ladder, the player can obtain a large amount of ladder crumbs (for weapon advancement and magic mark upgrades), and improve their strength. The current version of the ladder has 165 floors at the top.

【 Other gameplay 】

The rest of the Dimensional Exploration book is in the Time Station (Active world).

【 Race 】

The Discovery book will launch a racing competition every six months (during winter and summer vacations). The racing competition is divided into junior, intermediate and advanced fields. Players participating in the racing competition need to use their own archives to beat the BOSS specially prepared by the producer for the racing competition.

【 Version Update 】

The Dimensional Exploration Book version 2.1 is now available, and details of the updates are available in the game.

name: 次元探索簿

Sexualisierte Gewalt / Sexual violence
Gewalt
Alkohol / Tabak

short_description: Adventure Book in Dimension is a turn-based RPG based on the novel Wonderful Dimensional Journey. In the game, you as a new member of the human wizard team "Tribal Clan", experience the main adventure story of the "Tribal Clan" in a magic book given by your predecessors.
